name: Elections Commission - A. G. Peramunage of the Kurunegala Municipal Council has vacated member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - W. P. Sarachchandra of the Bingiriya Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated her member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna - D. N. D. Dilhami of the Panduwasnuwara Pradeshiya Sabha has vacated her office of the member of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna
